title: OpenAI Launched GPT-5.1
full: OpenAI rolled out its upgraded GPT-5.1 models — Instant and Thinking — offering more intelligent, conversational, and personalized interactions. The update includes new personality presets and better instruction following.

title: AI Orchestrated Cyberattack
full: Anthropic revealed that Chinese state-sponsored hackers used its Claude AI system in the first known large-scale autonomous cyber-espionage campaign, targeting 30 organizations with minimal human involvement.

title: Baidu Unveils New AI Chips
full: Baidu announced two new AI processors — M100 and M300 — along with an upgraded Ernie LLM capable of advanced image and video analysis, aiming for technological self-reliance amid US export restrictions.

title: Google’s Biggest Shopping AI Upgrade
full: Google rolled out a major enhancement to its AI Mode in Search for shopping, delivering more robust, intelligent, and streamlined shopping experiences.

title: Samsung’s $310B AI Investment
full: Samsung announced a massive $310 billion expansion involving new chip plants and data centers, accelerating its push into AI infrastructure and next-gen hardware.

title: AI in Cyber Defense
full: Following the Chinese cyberattack, Anthropic stressed the need for AI-driven cyber defense mechanisms to counter the rising risks posed by autonomous attack systems.

title: PwC Global AI Jobs Barometer
full: A new PwC report revealed that AI is making workers more valuable, even in highly automatable roles, influencing global job trends and critical skill demands.

title: IBM Warns About Data Silos
full: IBM highlighted that data silos continue to slow down enterprise AI adoption, stressing the need for unified and accessible data systems.

title: OpenAI Testing Group Chats
full: OpenAI began testing a new group chat system for ChatGPT that lets up to 20 people collaborate with each other and the AI simultaneously.

title: Indian Firms Scaling GenAI
full: Reports show Indian companies expanding Generative AI deployments, though cautious budgets are slowing larger-scale investments.
